function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Wide credible interval estimates for the reproduction number","Impact":"Uncertainty in the effectiveness of interventions and potential for higher transmission","Mitigation":"Improve data accuracy and conduct regular reviews of intervention effectiveness","Technologies":"Data analysis tools, modeling software","People":"Public health officials, researchers","Owner":"Public health agencies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Large epidemics of COVID-19 in Europe","Impact":"Overwhelmed health systems, increased transmission","Mitigation":"Implement and enforce strict non-pharmaceutical interventions, expand healthcare capacity","Technologies":"Telemedicine, remote monitoring, health information systems","People":"Healthcare workers, general population","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Non-pharmaceutical interventions vary between countries","Impact":"Inconsistent control of epidemics, potential for cross-border transmission","Mitigation":"Standardize interventions, improve coordination between countries","Technologies":"Communication platforms, data sharing systems","People":"National and international public health authorities","Owner":"Government, international health organizations"}]}
